casename: Baiduri Bank Bhd v Dong Sui Hung and Another
counsel: Leslie Chew SC (Khattar Wong & Partners) for the plaintiffs; Ng Siew Hoong (Peter Moe & Partners) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Conflict of Laws/Jurisdiction/Foreign jurisdiction clause not exclusive/Bank commencing action against guarantors in Singapore/Bank having option to enforce guarantee in any court of competent jurisdiction/Guarantors saying proper forum is Brunei/Whether action should be stayed
